metadata.description:
Collects Savage Sword of Conan (2019) #1-5 black-and-white.

The saga of the death cult of Koga Thun — in brutal black and white! This special collection features the sword-and-sorcery epic brought to life — and death — by Ron Garney’s sensational inked pages, printed without color so you can savor every barbaric detail!
metadata.name: Savage Sword Of Conan
